title: Jennifer Lawrence and Zendaya’s Ugg Slippers Are 50 Percent Off
text:
1 item in this article 1 item on sale! Photo: Courtesy of the vendor

We’ve been coveting a pair of Uggs slippers ever since we learned Andre Leon Talley can’t live without his. Back in the early days of the Strategist he told us: “There’s nothing like them. I didn’t want to wear Uggs for years. I thought, ‘Oh, Uggs.’” But: “Once you put on an Ugg, you never turn back.” They’re often just a little too pricey to justify, but right now this pair of pale-pink mule slippers (that are a wee bit Elle Woodsian, and which Jennifer Lawrence, Dakota Johnson, and Zendaya have been photographed wearing), are half off. The “sheepskin sockliner” apparently wicks moisture away so your dogs don’t start sweating, and the “Treadlite by Ugg” outsole means you can hustle down the stairs or retrieve the newspaper outside without slipping. Note: They run big, so it’s suggested you order down a size.

description: Today’s deal of the day is a pair of UGG Coquette slippers on sale for 50 percent off ($60) at Zappos.
